The best way I have found to get this timeworn map is by fishing it up at https://xivdb.com/placename/413/the+tangle in https://xivdb.com/placename/509/mor+dhona 
Bait: https://xivdb.com/item/2599/honey+worm  You can also use https://xivdb.com/item/2603/glowworm if you like.  
YOU MUST USE https://xivdb.com/action/4100/snagging to fish up the map!
Cheers  ^^
As of Patch 4.45, catching an HQ Ichtyosaur seems to be counting as two NQ Ichtyosaur, which leads to the shadows spawning earlier than 11 total fish speared.

Level 70 spearfishing nodes at https://xivdb.com/placename/2522
Use Large https://xivdb.com/action/7634/gig+head

The catch rate on the Flamefish is a little bit slow so I turned on https://xivdb.com/action/7911 ability to see the swimming shadows node.  The fish that causes the "unspoiled teeming waters" node to spawn is the https://xivdb.com/item/20222/glaring+perch
The only fish I got from this node was the Flamefish so you wanna make sure your GP is topped off and use https://xivdb.com/action/7907/bountiful+catch to catch extra Flamefish.  Worked out great for me.  Spent around 30 min. & I got X18 HQ X17 NQ Flamefish.  
Cheers & happy spearfishing!  ^^

Crafters! If you're needing to farm skins, Bentbranch (Central Shroud, 12,19 area) seems to have the best drop rate. See screenshot! Kill Lindwurms! You won't miss any if you go to each of the locations circled in red on the map in the screenshot. Make sure you circle the trees in those marked areas. Alternatively, you can send your retainers on hunts for these lvl 48 hunt. Good luck!
118 min collectability for best results from Kurenai.

U'lamana is an NPC (allied) combatant in two FATEs: Children of the Sands and Revenge of the Worms. She's rather elusive, since she's first out the door and therefore usually first to die, but it is possible to get some screenshots of her if you're standing in front of U'odh's hut before the start of Revenge of the Worms.

Caught in Bull's Bath, The Peaks (22,32)
